00114 template <unsigned D> void extrude_base<D>::extrude(unsigned d) {
00115     if (d >= D) {
00116         throw std::logic_error(
00117            "extrude_base::extrude() called on a higher dimension"
00118            " than the vector space allows");
00119     }
00120 
00121     const vector<Vector<D> > Xold = vertex_data<D>::X();
00122     typename vertex_data<D>::uintvec2D surface_old =
00123             vertex_data<D>::surface();
00124 
00125     for (unsigned i = 0; i < Xold.size(); ++i){
00126         Vector<D> xtmp = Xold[i];
00127         xtmp[d] = 1.;
00128         vertex_data<D>::X().push_back(xtmp);
00129 
00130         if (i != 0) {
00131             vertex_data<D>::addSurface(i-1, i,
00132                                        vertex_data<D>::X().size()-1,
00133                                        vertex_data<D>::X().size()-2);
00134             }
00135     }
00136     if (vertex_data<D>::dimension() > 1) {
00140         vertex_data<D>::addSurface(Xold.size()-1, 0,
00141                                 vertex_data<D>::X().size()-1, Xold.size());
00147         for (unsigned i = 0; i < surface_old.size(); ++i) {
00148             typename vertex_data<D>::uintvec1D tmp = surface_old[i];
00149             for (unsigned j = 0; j < tmp.size(); ++j) {
00150                 tmp[j] += Xold.size();
00151             }
00152             vertex_data<D>::addSurface(tmp[0], tmp[1], tmp[2], tmp[3]);
00153         }
00154     }
00155 
00156     vertex_data<D>::dimension()++;   //  object is now one dimension higher
00157 }
